page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT W.READING
page.content: This information is from 1094 families via 5 local schools.It was data partly volunteered so unemployment and less exciting jobs maybe under represented PROFESSIONAL 16% CLERICAL 28% SKILLED MANUAL 18% SEMI SKILLED MANUAL 19% UNSKILLED MANUAL 12% 7%were unemployed.58% of all families had a second wage earner,the average 2nd wage making 22% of the total.22% of all families had a 2nd wage earner contributing 30% or more of total family income.Only 1 job was recorded in primary industry,15% in secondary and 85% in tertiary.Total{population of the area is 49,500;density 4125/km (whole town 3302).It is declining slowly.33% is aged 10_29, a high proportion.11% have a birth place outside the U.K.
